justification: Notes B’s zero-RB but misreads it as motive to pay for a premium RB; omits B’s consensus-driven mindset and injury caution. Trade is wildly lopsided: A gives a Tier 1 workhorse RB for a Tier 4 WR and Tier 4 TE (A already has a better TE), undermining A’s ceiling-chasing playoff push. Minimal, non-specific rationale. Feasible but incoherent with team needs and profiles.
